value.title: bp and Microsoft join forces to advance sustainability goals
value.excerpt: (NEW YORK) — bp and Microsoft have joined forces to advance their sustainability goals. To become net-zero, bp will need to remove or offset the same amount of emissions it releases each year into the atmosphere.
